headerDisplay: The **Homebridge Belkin WeMo** plugin allows you to control your WeMo Devices from HomeKit. To get started setup your config below.
footerDisplay:
For Wemo Client see [Manual Setup Wiki](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-belkin-wemo/wiki/Manual-Setup).

Your WeMo device is setup, Pull Request are welcome at our [project page](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: The Name that will show up in homebridge log.

noMotionTimer.title: No Motion Timer
noMotionTimer.description: It is a timer in seconds for how long after motion is not detected that the state is changed.

items.description: Expects an array of serial numbers, any devices found with matching serial numbers will be skipped or removed from Homebridge.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: default: true. A way to disable device discovery if not required.
